Reviews.Title: Owned for 4-5 years
Reviews.Author: Anthony
Reviews.Content: I've owned this tv for 4-5 years and no problems whatsoever. Picture is perfect clear and I still sometimes think how great it is that I got the cheapest 32" tv and it's worked great and looked great for this long, and still going strong.

Reviews.Title: Very nice for the price!
Reviews.Author: Alli
Reviews.Content: Works well and easy to set up. Definitely more than met my expectations for the price! Haven't had any problems with it yet.
